## Import dataset

```{r}
head(cancer_data)
```

## EDA
```{r}
summary(cancer_data)

# Data types
str(cancer_data)

# Missing values
sum(is.na(cancer_data))

# Duplicates
duplicated(cancer_data)

# Distribution of predictors
hist.data.frame(cancer_data)

# Distribution of diagnosis classes
table(cancer_data$diagnosis)
prop.table(table(cancer_data$diagnosis))

# Relationship between predictors and response
predictors <- c("radius_mean", "texture_mean", "perimeter_mean",
                "area_mean", "smoothness_mean", "compactness_mean",
                "concavity_mean", "concave points_mean", "symmetry_mean",
                "fractal_dimension_mean", "radius_se", "texture_se",
                "perimeter_se", "area_se", "smoothness_se",
                "compactness_se", "concavity_se", "concave points_se",
                "symmetry_se", "fractal_dimension_se", "radius_worst",
                "texture_worst", "perimeter_worst", "area_worst",
                "smoothness_worst", "compactness_worst", "concavity_worst",
                "concave points_worst", "symmetry_worst", "fractal_dimension_worst")

par(mfrow = c(6, 6))

for (var in predictors) {
  boxplot(cancer_data[[var]] ~ cancer_data$diagnosis, main = paste(var, "by diagnosis"), xlab = "diagnosis", ylab = var)
}

# Predictors w/ near zero variance
degenerate <- nearZeroVar(cancer_data)
print(degenerate)

# Correlation between predictors
cor(cancer_data[, -2])

# Outlier detection
boxplot(cancer_data[-2])

# Skewness
apply(cancer_data[, -2], 2, skewness)
```
